long_description: The highest quality 800-fill-power goose down and a waterproof shell make the Marmot Col Membrain -20 sleeping bag the right bag for serious mountaineering in extreme conditions. Marmot MemBrain(R) shell is breathable, downproof and waterproof. Lofty, premium 800-fill-power goose down offers superb warmth for minimal weight; it has been meticulously cleaned and processed for hypoallergenic qualities. 9-baffle chest section provides maximum goose down control for warmth and durability. 6-Baffle Hood envelops your head in warmth; Face Muff allows hood to be cinched snug without digging into your face. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make hood adjustments easy. Hood closure system stays closed without the use of rip-and-stick and also keeps the drawstring and zipper away from your face. Spacious 11-baffle footbox allows down to loft fully; footbox is reinforced to handle extra abuse of boot liners and water bottle. Down-filled draft collar increases warmth; hidden pocket in down-filled draft tube keep small items such as lip balm or your watch warm and accessible. Zipper guards prevent zipper snags; locking, full-length zippers keep bag from opening in the night. Comes with nylon stuff sack and a storage bag.
